title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Skills: Digital Phases for Diagnosing Automotive Electrical/Electronic System Failures

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose electrical system failures with 90% accuracy by following step-by-step instructions in a digital diagnostic system.
Learners can independently identify over 70% of faults in complex electronic systems by analyzing circuit diagrams.
Learners can interpret data acquired during the diagnostic process and propose appropriate repair solutions in over 80% of cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
